channel.title: How to play music in 508 server?
channel.description:
Hey,
I have seen alot of 508 servers that i join and suddenly music plays when i join them. I have my own server and would like to know how you play music when you log into the server? and would i also be able to choose the song?
,thanks ,deery50
EDIt: please help cause i am really annoyed. There are no tuts on it and i searched using the search bar.
